alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:50AM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain bringing total ice accumulations from one tenth to one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST /noon CST/ today. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are expected into late morning including the morning commute. Isolated power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold ground temperatures have caused secondary and untreated roads to become icy and very slippery. Pavement temperatures will rise above freezing later today and allow travel conditions to improve.
info.instruction: Outdoor surfaces have become icy and extremely slippery. If you must travel, be especially careful driving. Sidewalks, driveways and other paved surfaces have also become icy and should be used with extreme caution.
